# Arrowtooth flounder 

## columns 

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| fig-cap: "Estimated design-based biomass."
plot_design_based(
  data = biomass[biomass$common_name == "arrowtooth flounder", ],
  plot = 1
)
```

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| fig-cap: "Standardized design-based estimates by region."
plot_design_based(
  data = biomass[biomass$common_name == "arrowtooth flounder", ],
  plot = 2
)
```

## columns

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| fig-cap: "Estimated length-mass relationship by region."
plot_biology(
  data = specimens[specimens$common_name == "arrowtooth flounder", ],
  parameters = parameters,
  plot = 1
)
```

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| fig-cap: "Estimated age-length relationship by region."
plot_biology(
  data = specimens[specimens$common_name == "arrowtooth flounder", ],
  parameters = parameters,
  plot = 2
)
```
